Valid User for TRNG Lock

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x5c
Size:
0x4

Description

Valid PAUSER attributes for requests from SoC APB Interface. Each bit corresponds to locking the associated VALID_PAUSER register.

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] LOCK rw 0x0 -
